DOC.brief_summary: A study of the long-term (1 year) effectiveness of atorvastatin to keep patients of high cardiovascular risk at the LDL cholesterol goal of <115 mg/dL
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Atorvastatin For The Treatment Of High Cholesterol In Patients At High Risk Of Coronary Heart Disease (CHD)
DOC.criteria: Completion of base study Dyslipidemia and at high risk of CHD Impaired liver function Gastrointestinal disease that could limit drug absorption
